DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety efficacy RX-10045 placebo treatment sign symptom dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study RX-10045 Signs Symptoms Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year age ; Have provide write informed consent ; Have history dry eye least 6 month prior enrollment ; Have history use desire use eye drop dry eye symptom within past 6 month ; Demonstrate response expose CAE . Have ongoing ocular infection , active ocular inflammation Have wear contact lenses within 72 hour Visit 1 anticipate use contact lenses study ; Have contact lensinduced dry eye ; Have previously laser situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) surgery ; Be use anticipate use temporary punctual plug study ; Have best correct visual acuity > +0.7 eye ; Be woman pregnant , nurse planning pregnancy ; Have know allergy and/or sensitivity test article component ; Be currently use medication know cause ocular drying use stable dose regimen least 30 day
